reference.title: Database length and default display length annotation

refbody.section:
Annotation property the Page Designer uses for setting default value on Maximum characters property for text field widget.
Name: TripleA
Namespace URI: http://www.odcgroup.com/mdf/aaa This annotation can have the following properties:
Define the maximum number of characters of an attribute that can be stored in the database.
This attribute must be based on the built-in Business Type code or name, and its value cannot be greater than 60.
Property name: AttrMaxDbLength
Property value: Integer
Define the default maximum number of characters the user can enter in the user interface.
These properties are defined during the importation of the Triple'A Plus Core meta-dictionary and formats. For any other attributes based on different business types (not code and name) , the maximum number of characters is determined by annotation on business type itself. This cannot be changed in the Domain Designer as the relative files are read-only.
The user can redefine these properties on an attribute of a dataset, or in the Page Designer directly on the widget's property.
